title: Man Beaten Up, Restrained After Trying To Open Door On Copa Airlines Flight
content: An unruly plane passenger who attempted to open the emergency door mid-flight was beaten up and restrained by fellow passengers on a Copa Airlines flight.
summary: An unruly plane passenger who attempted to open the emergency door mid-flight was beaten up and restrained by fellow passengers on a Copa Airlines flight.

title: 'Nostradamus' Of US Predicted Harris Win. Moment He Realised He Was Wrong
content: Allan Lichtman, Nostradamus of US polls, was at a loss for words as his prediction that Kamala Harris would win the presidential election turned wrong.
summary: Allan Lichtman, Nostradamus of US polls, was at a loss for words as his prediction that Kamala Harris would win the presidential election turned wrong.

title: How Donald Trump's US Election Win Would Benefit Elon Musk's Companies
content: Elon Musk contributed at least $119 million to a pro-Trump spending group and tirelessly touted the former president at the critical late stage of his campaign against Kamala Harris.
summary: Elon Musk contributed at least $119 million to a pro-Trump spending group and tirelessly touted the former president at the critical late stage of his campaign against Kamala Harris.

title: "National Security Risk": Canada Orders Shutdown Of TikTok's Offices
content: Ottawa last year began reviewing TikTok's plan to invest and expand its business in Canada. ByteDance is TikTok's Chinese parent company.
summary: Ottawa last year began reviewing TikTok's plan to invest and expand its business in Canada. ByteDance is TikTok's Chinese parent company.

title: Trump 2.0: A Look At Top Candidates Who Are Set For White House Stints
content: Donald Trump on Wednesday sealed his historic comeback to the White House and defeated Kamala Harris.
summary: Donald Trump on Wednesday sealed his historic comeback to the White House and defeated Kamala Harris.

title: "I Hate Y'all Bad": Cardi B Reacts To Donald Trump's US Election Win
content: After Donald Trump's victory in the 2024 presidential election, several celebrities who had supported Kamala Harris slammed the Republican leader. Among them was Grammy-winning rapper Cardi B, who was seen campaigning for Ms Harris last week.
summary: After Donald Trump's victory in the 2024 presidential election, several celebrities who had supported Kamala Harris slammed the Republican leader. Among them was Grammy-winning rapper Cardi B, who was seen campaigning for Ms Harris last week.

title: Germany Heads For Early Elections As Coalition Government Collapses
content: Olaf Scholz said he would seek a vote of confidence by January 15 so that MPs "can decide whether to clear the way for early elections" which could be held by late March -- six months earlier than scheduled.
summary: Olaf Scholz said he would seek a vote of confidence by January 15 so that MPs "can decide whether to clear the way for early elections" which could be held by late March -- six months earlier than scheduled.

title: US Deserves A "Badass Commander-In-Chief": Vivek Ramaswamy On Trump's Win
content: Of the view that the comeback of president-elect Donald Trump is the American comeback, entrepreneur-turned-politician Vivek Ramaswamy on Wednesday said that the country deserves a "badass commander-in-chief" right now and that's exactly what it got.
summary: Of the view that the comeback of president-elect Donald Trump is the American comeback, entrepreneur-turned-politician Vivek Ramaswamy on Wednesday said that the country deserves a "badass commander-in-chief" right now and that's exactly what it got.

title: Biden's Legacy In Ruins After Trump Triumph
content: Joe Biden hoped Kamala Harris would salvage his legacy as the man who saved America from Donald Trump. Instead, it lies in tatters.
summary: Joe Biden hoped Kamala Harris would salvage his legacy as the man who saved America from Donald Trump. Instead, it lies in tatters.

title: Australia To Ban Social Media For Children Under 16
content: Australia will move to pass new laws banning children under 16 from social media, Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said Thursday, vowing to crack down on tech companies failing to protect young users.
summary: Australia will move to pass new laws banning children under 16 from social media, Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said Thursday, vowing to crack down on tech companies failing to protect young users.

title: Ukraine's Zelenskiy Says He Spoke With Trump Following Election Victory
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Wednesday that he spoke with U.S. President-elect Donald Trump following his election victory.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Wednesday that he spoke with U.S. President-elect Donald Trump following his election victory.

title: Barack Obama Congratulates Trump On Election Victory
content: Former president Barack Obama on Wednesday congratulated Donald Trump on his election victory, noting the importance of a peaceful transfer of power.
summary: Former president Barack Obama on Wednesday congratulated Donald Trump on his election victory, noting the importance of a peaceful transfer of power.

title: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz Fires Rebellious Finance Minister
content: Germany's Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Wednesday fired his rebellious Finance Minister Christian Lindner, spelling doom for the three-party coalition though Scholz could stay on in a minority government.
summary: Germany's Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Wednesday fired his rebellious Finance Minister Christian Lindner, spelling doom for the three-party coalition though Scholz could stay on in a minority government.

title: "Only When It Is Dark...": Kamala Harris' Message As She Concedes To Trump
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris conceded the presidential election to Donald Trump after an acrimonious, turbulent and polarising campaign.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris conceded the presidential election to Donald Trump after an acrimonious, turbulent and polarising campaign.

title: vThe Trump Dynasty Soon To Be America's "First Family"
content: President-elect Donald Trump will return to the White House in January joined by his family, who played an outsized role in his first administration and on the campaign trail this year.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump will return to the White House in January joined by his family, who played an outsized role in his first administration and on the campaign trail this year.

title: Biden Congratulates Trump On Win, Invites Him To White House
content: President Joe Biden called Donald Trump to congratulate him on his victory Wednesday and invited his Republican successor to hold a meeting in the "near future," the White House said.
summary: President Joe Biden called Donald Trump to congratulate him on his victory Wednesday and invited his Republican successor to hold a meeting in the "near future," the White House said.

title: Trump, Kamala Harris Agree On Importance Of "Unifying Country": His Team
content: Donald Trump spoke with Kamala Harris by telephone Wednesday and agreed with his White House rival on the need to unify the nation after their contentious campaign, the president-elect's team said.
summary: Donald Trump spoke with Kamala Harris by telephone Wednesday and agreed with his White House rival on the need to unify the nation after their contentious campaign, the president-elect's team said.

title: Sundar Pichai To Nikki Haley, How Indian-Americans Reacted To Trump 2.0
content: Eminent Indian Americans on Wednesday welcomed the re-election of Donald Trump as the 47th president of the United States and assured to work with him on several issues, including that of the US-India relationship.
summary: Eminent Indian Americans on Wednesday welcomed the re-election of Donald Trump as the 47th president of the United States and assured to work with him on several issues, including that of the US-India relationship.

title: Kamala Harris Calls Trump To Congratulate Him On Election Win: Her Aide
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris called Donald Trump on Wednesday to congratulate him for winning the 2024 presidential election, one of her senior aides said, following a bitter and contentious race.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris called Donald Trump on Wednesday to congratulate him for winning the 2024 presidential election, one of her senior aides said, following a bitter and contentious race.

title: Kamala Harris Dials Trump To Concede Presidential Election, Say Her Aides
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris called Donald Trump on Wednesday to congratulate him for winning the 2024 presidential election, one of her senior aides said, following a bitter and contentious race.
